name: Ninja vs Worms
description:
SHOOT TEH NASTY WORMS AND DONT GET KEELED

This is my Ludum Dare 29 submission. You can play it for free, but I would appreciate a tiny donation. It'll allow my to fuel my Starbucks addiction :P

I plan on creating a game with similar mechanics eventually (I'll probably remove the worms though and make it more of a action-platformer-shooter-thing).

If you have any suggestions for more features let me know on Twitter.
